name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Back-End Engineer with 10+ years of experience delivering robust **AI-driven cybersecurity solutions** and high-performance **back-end services**. Proficient in developing **scalable systems** and infrastructure leveraging technologies such as **Node.js**, **Python**, and **FastAPI**. Experienced in agile development practices and fostering collaboration across cross-functional teams to build efficient and secure applications. Strong expertise in implementing **microservices architecture** and **event-driven systems** to support mission-critical operations. Additionally, skilled in deploying cloud-native applications on **Azure** and **AWS**, ensuring compliance with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS. Passionate about enhancing system performance and security through innovative development and real-world problem-solving.
